data.text: I was in grand central hotel from 26-January to 2-February we arrive late to the hotel they give us a big suite for one night it was good next day we moved to a room in sixth floor the room size was good but the room need a renovation one of the pillow was dirty and in the hotel there is two night club one of them in the top of the hotel the sound was so loud till 4 in the morning it was hard to sleep good the breakfast was poor most of the food was Indian breakfast it was not satisfying and not good taste the location was good about 5 minute walking to the metro
data.title: This hotel must be better

data.text: I donâ€™t know how this hotel is 4 stars hotel â€¦ it doesnâ€™t deserve even 1 starâ€¦ bad room old furnitureâ€¦noisy and not clean .. heater isnâ€™t working .. pool isnâ€™t work .. bad smell and they took 200 derhams for insurance before our stay .. very rude staff
data.title: Terrible hotel

data.text: AVOID THIS HOTEL!!!Donâ€™t go to this hotel if you are clever ,very stingy management ice is chargeable ,extra cups ,water (this is new to me for a number of hotels I have stayed in ,if you are staying there you can ask for as much water as you want!!!!! ,tang is served as juice at breakfast chef cooking eggs was very dirty no gloves as I was giving my order he walked away to go get something he wasnâ€™t listening. dining staff were always fighting infront of customers very unprofessional especially the Filipino guy !,telephone in the room wasnâ€™t working I had to go down each time,short of reception staff they had only one who was very slow ,rooms are very old and smelly it they have cockroachesðŸ¥²ðŸ¥²!!! ,went to try the spa the ladies are very rude couldnâ€™t sleep because of the noise from that filthy stripper club upstairs I regret bringing my child ..I honestly was in tears almost during my stay THIS IS SAD NO VALUE OF MONEY AT ALL .I couldnâ€™t wait to pack out to the next hotel this is not even a hotel I have stayed in a number of hotels and resorts this is not even close to a 3 star yet itâ€™s rated as a 4 star how can you charge for ordinary ice WI FI was unstable yet I had an important business meeting the management of this hotel needs to be changed not even worth 100$ I paid for the night
data.title: AVOID THIS PLACE

data.text:
Pros
- large room
- value for money
- location
Cons
 - the front desk staff didn't assist me even Im the one came to the desk first and I have to stand aside as his attention was on the other guests whose coming behind me.
- unstable internet connection, it keeps disconnecting most of the time.
- it get noisy at times like when someone using the washroom on the above floor you can hear the water on the drainage, sound from the club and people passing by the corridor.
- old room vibe, the room needs renovation.
- bathroom was fine but the toilet seat was not totally clean I saw some pee droplets and hairs so I have to wipe it myself.
- the remote was not clean for a long time, Im not even sure if I want to touch that remote.
- theres like 3 channels that are not working (see photo).
data.title: not something to remember

data.text:
Dirty, Smelly, Noisy, Dusty

I had to call the reception because of the noise from their nightclub, the receptionist was so very rude and unhelpful!

If a hotel can afford a club in its premises, then it has to make sure it is not impacting guests'sleep! 
3h to have the check-in done, and arrived to an old, dirty and very smelly room! 
I've called booking.com directly to cancel my stay as disappointed I was.
The Hotel manager helped me a lot at thank you for the efforts, really appreciated.
data.title: Dirty, Smelly, Noisy, Dusty
